page.title: 13GROBY HIGH SCHOOL CLUBS.
page.content: Brookvale High School in Groby offers many clubs and societies for pupils.Many involve a sport and those available include gymnastics, trampolining,volleyball,dance and cross country in addition to the usual range of team games.Non sporting clubs include a drama group, which in June this year put on a very enjoyable production of 'Bugsy Malone',and 'Fighting Fantasy' and 'Dungeons and Dragons'clubs.Both the latter ones being run by the pupils themselves.For those who enjoy work there are even Maths,Science and Writing clubs. Members of clubs are given a blue 'Priority Pass',which enables them to have their lunch straight away when the bell goes thus missing 15 minutes waiting time in the queue.Belonging to a club is fun and gives you a chance to represent the school.
